question: Sadyr Zhaparov has been appointed as the new Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
Kyrgyzstan’s Parliament has recently named Lawmaker Sadyr Zhaparov as the country’s new Prime Minister.
This has strengthened the power of President Sooronbay Jeenbekov’s control as his principal opponent and ex-President Almazbek Atambayev was arrested. The country’s Election Commission earlier declared the poll results invalid.
